title: "IBM’s New Tool Lets Marketers Tailor Ads to Coronavirus Conditions in a Given Area"
excerpt: "A new tool from IBM Watson uses public health data and artificial intelligence to track where Covid-19 is on the rise or decline so that marketers can better customize their advertising to the pandemic situation in a particular area."
